MacGregor House

Scroll through this page to see photos, facts, and other amazing aspects of the tallest, most diverse undergraduate dorm on campus

Game Room

A good space for chilling, equipped with a large projection screen, video and board games.

Study Room

Silent study space and group-working rooms on the ground floor, a great place to focus aside from your single.

Weight Room

One of the best equipped weight rooms among undergrad dorms with access to all kinds of fitness equipment.

Dining Room

A spacious room that comes with tables and chairs, usually used for dorm-wide events or meetings. Can be reserved via Facilities > Room Reservation.

Dance Studio

The front-side of the dining hall with an entire wall of mirrors installed. Great for dance practice and can be reserved via Facilities > Room Reservation

Bike Storage

Installed in 2017, this outdoor bike storage area is protected by MacGregor Resident ID Access Only.

More to come......
